Package uk.co.cbray.msc.nhsdsp.dao

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssessmentRepository
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for Assessments and provides a simple and readable api.
    DataAccessObject
    Generic DAO capable of providing all of the persistence functionality required by the application.
    DiagnosisRepository
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for Diagnosis and provides a simple and readable api.
    DrugRepository
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for Drugs and provides a simple and readable api.
    EffectRepository
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for Effects and provides a simple and readable api.
    IllnessRepository
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for Illnesses and provides a simple and readable api.
    IncidentRepository
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for Incidents and provides a simple and readable api.
    PatientAllergyRepository
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for PatientAllergy and provides a simple and readable api.
    PatientDetailsRepository
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for PatientDetails and provides a simple and readable api.
    UserRepository
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for Users and provides a simple and readable api.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataAccessErrorCode
    Enum used to store error codes and messages for database related exceptions.
